text: The National Library of Israel (NLI; ; formerly the Jewish National and University Library - JNUL, ), is the national library of the state of Israel. It is on the campus of Hebrew University of Jerusalem in Givat Ram. ==Other websites== * Official site * Saving the Holy of Holies of Jewish texts , by Nir Hasson on Haaretz Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem Category:National libraries
title: National Library of Israel
